text: resia - Failure to thrive - Heterotopia - Infantile muscular hypotonia - Infantile spasms - Inguinal hernia - Pachygyria - Pelvic kidney - Polydactyly - Progressive spastic paraplegia - Recurrent aspiration pneumonia - Upslanted palpebral fissure - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as
